Text: Green Power Cc Kathleen Croiset informed me that you were the contact for metering issues at Green Power The following email was sent to Richard Ring If you are better suited to address my inquiry please let me know Forwarded by Lisa PittEWCEnron on AM Lisa Pitt AM To Richard nronXGate cc Michael PayneENRON NRONDEVELOPMENt Subject Green Power Asset Management is in the process of updating site information and seeking documentation of revenue meter testing at Green Power Marion did not know who I should request this information from and suggested that I start with EES All the other projects have a stipulation in their agreements requiring utilities to undertake testing of their metering equipment to verify the accuracy of such equipment If testing reveals that the equipment is outside of a specified range then the utility will calibrate the meter I am looking to send a request for evidence or certification of such testing at Green Power Specifically I need the contact information for the EES utility liaison or the person at the utility who is responsible for verifying metering accuracy at this site If you know of anyone who can assist with this matter please forward their contact information to me Thanks

Green Power Cc Asset Management is in the process of updating site information and seeking documentation of revenue meter testing at Green Power Marion did not know who I should request this information from and suggested that I start with EES All the other projects have a stipulation in their agreements requiring utilities to undertake testing of their metering equipment to verify the accuracy of such equipment If testing reveals that the equipment is outside of a specified range then the utility will calibrate the meter I am looking to send a request for evidence or certification of such testing at Green Power Specifically I need the contact information for the EES utility liaison or the person at the utility who is responsible for verifying metering accuracy at this site If you know of anyone who can assist with this matter please forward their contact information to me Thanks
